description: During a friendly game of pool, the beefy hunk Rick Bauer makes a move on Kevin Cage. What's the natural course of action? They start sucking dick, of course. Fellow player Evan Rochelle starts stroking his own cock out of excitement while watching the two guys go at it. But no one should be left out of the fun: Evan joins in, and the threesome can't contain themselves as they move into some intense anal territory!
title: Intense Threesome on the Pool Table
